Posts.Content: Hi, never thought in a million years that I would be on one of these chat sites....but so glad I've found you guys now. Been told that I have a Grade 3 Invasive Ductal Carcinoma. Lymph Nodes look likes that may have got cancer too...waiting for a start date for Chemo, scary stuff, but looking forward to cracking on with it. Hate the waiting though, my mind is going a little mad....my throat glades feel slightly swollen is this normal? I'm sure it's nothing but you can't help but worry x x
Posts.Title: Newbie just diagnosed: Hi
